scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation

Class MergeHeatMapPlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • scriptmanager.scripts.Figure_Generation.MergeHeatMapPlot

  • public class MergeHeatMapPlot
extends java.lang.Object
    The script class to merge two PNG files (typically sense & anti heatmaps output by scripts.Figure_Generation.TwoColorHeatMap).
    Author:
    William KM Lai
    See Also:
    MergeHeatMapCLI, MergeHeatMapOutput, MergeHeatMapWindow

      • mergePNG

        public static javax.swing.JLabel mergePNG(java.io.File INPUT1,
                                          java.io.File INPUT2,
                                          java.io.File OUTPUT)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Method for merging two same-sized PNG files into a new PNG using a pixel-by-pixel color averaging strategy.
        Parameters:
        INPUT1 - The first of two same-sized PNGs
        INPUT2 - The second of two same-sized PNGs
        OUTPUT - The filepath to save the averaged PNG (same pixel dimensions as input PNG files)
        Returns:
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
